frontend.simulation

Class SimulationPaneManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • frontend.SlogoBaseUIManager<javafx.scene.layout.Region>
      • frontend.simulation.SimulationPaneManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectManager<javafx.scene.layout.Region>, javafx.collections.ListChangeListener<State>

    public class SimulationPaneManager
extends SlogoBaseUIManager<javafx.scene.layout.Region>
implements javafx.collections.ListChangeListener<State>
    Manager for simulation window This class has public visibility, and thus adds to the External Frontend API The class is designed to setup and manage the simulation window of the Frontend implementation. It has a MenuBar and an Environment Display. It also implements a SimulationMenuBarDelegate in order to communicate with it's menu bar.
    Author:
    Andreas Santos
